name: Arthur BAILEY, Appellant, v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent, Sci-Dallas, PA, Appellee

parties: Arthur BAILEY, Appellant, v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent, Sci-Dallas, PA, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of August, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
805 A.2d 1211
Arthur BAILEY, Appellant, v. Thomas LAVAN, Superintendent, Sci-Dallas, PA, Appellee.
No. 86 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 1, 2002.
